properties.name: auth.credentials.expire-in-days
properties.description: How many days the credentials are valid for before they need to be reset.

properties.name: auth.token-lifetime-mins
properties.description: Number of minutes an authorization token will remain valid.

properties.name: auth.refresh-token-lifetime-mins
properties.description: Number of minutes a refresh authorization token will remain valid.

properties.name: jwt.issuer
properties.description: Name of the issuer of the JWT.

properties.name: auth.max-concurrent-logins
properties.description: Maximum number of logins allowed at the same time.
